title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Competencies: Pre-Service Teacher Capacity Building Using Acid-Base e-Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational chemistry concepts and basic familiarity with educational settings
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain the design principles of acid-base e-learning modules based on the ADDIE model
Develop three or more instructional strategies to effectively deliver acid-base concepts in mobile environments
Design and implement project-based assessment tools using e-learning modules

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
